sceneSelect.message: Choose a scene package to quickly start the project, or skip to make detailed selections.

choices.title: editor
choices.description: Based on leafer-ui ,suitable for online graphic editing scenarios.

choices.title: draw
choices.description: A simplified leafer-ui version,more suitable for pure drawing scenarios.

leaferInSelect.message: Choose the official feature plugins you want.
leaferInSelect.hint: - Space to select. Return to submit

choices.title: interface
choices.description: TypeScript interface of official feature plugins.

choices.title: editor
choices.description: Used to edit operation graphics and provides rich features and style configuration.

choices.title: scroll
choices.description: Infinite canvas scroll bar, display horizontal and vertical scroll bars on demand

choices.title: arrow
choices.description: Add start/end arrows for a line

choices.title: view
choices.description: Control the zoom of the view

choices.title: state
choices.description: Control the state of the element

choices.title: text-editor
choices.description: Double-click the text to enter the editing state

choices.title: robot
choices.description: sprite , used to make game action, configuration animation.

shouldOverwrite.message: is not empty. Remove existing files and continue?

packageName.message: Package name (must be a valid npm package name):
packageName.hint: Leave empty to use the project name

pluginPackageName.hint:
plugin's package name should start with 'leafer-x-' 
upper-layer application's package name should start with 'leafer-'

welcome.message: Like a small tree sprouting, continuously growing, full of hope and vitality.
